mapper.select: SELECT UUID, CODE, TITLE, ISSUE_TYPE, PRIORITY, VERSION_CODE FROM v_issue WHERE principal = #{principal} AND object_code = #{object_code} AND STATE = '1' ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT t.uuid, 'T' issue_type, t.task_code issue_code, t.object_code, t.model_code, t.title, t.description, t.principal, u1.nickname principal_user_name, t.parent_code, t.version_code, t.priority, t.working_day, t.deadline, t.state, t.is_read, t.is_enable, t.create_time, t.create_user, u2.nickname create_user_name FROM t_task t LEFT JOIN s_users u1 ON u1.username = t.principal AND u1.isenable = '1' LEFT JOIN s_users u2 ON u2.username = t.create_user AND u2.isenable = '1' WHERE t.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT t.uuid, 'B' issue_type, t.bug_code issue_code, t.object_code, t.model_code, t.title, t.description, t.principal, u1.nickname principal_user_name, t.parent_code, t.version_code, t.priority, t.bug_level, t.result, t.deadline, t.state, t.is_read, t.is_enable, t.create_time, t.create_user, u2.nickname create_user_name FROM t_bug t LEFT JOIN s_users u1 ON u1.username = t.principal AND u1.isenable = '1' LEFT JOIN s_users u2 ON u2.username = t.create_user AND u2.isenable = '1' WHERE t.uuid = #{uuid}
select model_code from s_model where object_code = #{objectId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_push ( uuid, business_id, issue_type, model_code, description, create_user, create_time, push_state, isenable ) VALUES ( #{uuid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{issueType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{model_code,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{create_user,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, sysdate(), '0', '1' );
